titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an John Maynard Keynes, [nach 3. 12. 1928]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der King's College Library in Cambridge; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 127; deutsch: Briefe, S. 166; Cambridge Letters, S. 226).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I had to postpone my trip, as my health was not quite strong enough in the first days of this month. But I am nearly well now & want to come to England in the beginning of January. Please write a line letting me know if I can see you then.
